com.jmr.wrapper.server

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jmr.wrapper.server.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Networking Library ConnectionManager.java Purpose: Holds all connections currently connected to the server. It is a Singleton and provides methods to get and receive information.
    Version:
    1.0 7/19/2014
    Author:
    Jon R (Baseball435)
